website_summaries.verdict: This is a basic water rocket launching system, designed more for classroom science demonstrations than backyard fun, but it still delivers a powerful punch per launch. Be sure to budget for an additional pump or compressor.
pros: Flights can be exceptionally high and fast, with only one-fourth of a bottle filled
Great educational tool for STEM classes
Includes O-rings, fins, pressure hose, and other essential parts
cons: Pictured air pump not included in package
Two-liter bottle rocket not as aerodynamic as others on the shortlist
Fins are narrow, tend to tip over before launch

customer_reviews.title: FRAUDULENT MARKETING PRACTICES !  PUMP NOT INCLUDED!
customer_reviews.text: FRAUDULENT MARKETING PRACTICES!!!!!!!! GUys, this add needs to be fixed Immediatley. Your Clearly False marketing by having that Bike Pump in the pictured surrounded by all the other parts. YEAHHHHH I KNOW, now that I read the fine print, it does not list the pump as Included, but it CERTAINLY does not say its not included either. I am pretty sure you know EXACTLY what your doing by marketing like this and having the PUMP included in the picture. Read the other reviews, others have thought it was included also. RETURN COMING YOUR WAY for Misleading and FRAUDULENT MARKETING PRACTICES My recommendation and remedy: Either sell on Amazon ethically, or Close your Seller account
customer_reviews.author: Straight Up Review

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase. RIP OFF. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: NOT RECOMMENDED. Like many other reviews. This is deceitful marketing. The pump is not included. This kit is worth about 4 bucks without the pump. Don’t waste your money. I always read reviews before purchasing. I can’t believe I missed this one.
customer_reviews.author: David Mason

customer_reviews.title: Deceitful Add
customer_reviews.text: One of those accidental buys where I am going off of a picture and basic description and don't get anywhere near what I thought. Read the fine print, this thing only comes with a bottle and like 2 fins for it, no hoses, air system, nothin'.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Chown

customer_reviews.title: Rip off! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: So I order this thing after reading several good reviews, I figure all the parts and pieces are sturdy and good quality. When it shows up at my door I find I have paid $25 for a soda bottle and some cheap tubing. It seems since my order the small print says the pump is not included, but it shows the pump in the picture..... aaaand nope the pump is not included. Very dissapointed in this product!
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Misleading Marketing - Pump is NOT Included.
customer_reviews.text: Advertisement VERY misleading - the fact that the air pump is not included should be prominently displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy get it somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: I used this to show my 7yr old and her friends. Very disappointed when you order something like this and pay 23 bucks all the stuff should come with it. You can by the same stuff without air pump for 10bucks should have done that. Wood not recommend this kit
customer_reviews.author: Connie Chavus

customer_reviews.title: An absolute blast. Goes MUCH higher than you'd think ...
customer_reviews.text: An absolute blast. Goes MUCH higher than you'd think. We have bought two - and lost two. Landed Somewhere in the neighborhood. Went so far we're not sure whose door to knock on to get it back.....
customer_reviews.author: AugustaDoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice product. the rocket shoots quite high at least 50 feet. My son loves this
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Its a scam...
customer_reviews.text: In the image it says that it is it comes with a pump with a pressure gauge on it, but really the pump isn't included at all. For a suggestion, don't pay twenty-four dollars for a bottle and a stand for the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dingane Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Replacement plug should come with it
customer_reviews.text: Used 3 time and lost the rubber plug in the bottom . Should come with a spare or make in the cap so it dose not come out Everytime you use it
customer_reviews.author: Russell Condray

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave that one star because it came on time, other than that a total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Ja'Quel

customer_reviews.title: FUN...really flies!  Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons 10 and 12. We had a blast with this thing and launched it a half dozen times. Not a one and done (and we still have all the parts). We did have to hunt for it...wow does it fly. Open field best place as it did go in the trees or on the roof. I tried to video blast off but it was too fast for me. We knew it did not include the bike pump, not a problem for us. If you go to a park or field bring water, have to refill bottle to 1/4 level each blast off.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with everything pictured
customer_reviews.text: I thought this kit would arrive with everything pictured. Turns out that if you scroll down the page, buried in the details, is that this kit doesn't include the pump. THAT would have been nice to know before I purchased. Or better, sell it as an accessory to the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: don't buy, there is no pump included with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Estes

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is lots of fun with the kids. It is difficult to pump for smaller kids. My son is 5 and there was too much pressure for him to operate the hand pump. A hand or foot pump is probably better. When I used an air compressor, the pressure builds up faster and probably gets more pressure in the bottle. When it launches with more pressure, the fins fly off the screw cap with parts flying everywhere that are difficult to find. Launch it away from trees, it easy gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Turner

customer_reviews.title: Delta vs 4M Water Rocket
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Delta water rocket and the 4M water rocket for or grandson's 6th birthday party. The Delta rocket, although more expensive, did not perform as well. We were operating in a large grass field under breezy conditions. The Delta rocket has a larger (think 2 liter) bottle that is not as aerodynamic as the 4M smaller and slimmer bottle. Also the Delta's fins provide a narrow stance and constantly tip over while being pumped up to fire. The 4M fins provided a very stable stance. The Delta parts were of high quality so I think a simple redesign of the fin stance along with a smaller more aerodynamic bottle would be an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Would Have Been 5 Starts If It Actually Included the Pump
customer_reviews.text: There is no bike pump included. Get another picture without the bike pump and the FIVE STAR ratings will flow in. My son loved this science project and we had a ball building and launching this thing. Beware, it fliesHIGH and it flies FAST
customer_reviews.author: John T. OFarrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use great fun . flys high. needs lots of space (baseball field) calm day.
customer_reviews.author: vincent grasso

customer_reviews.title: The pump in the picture doesn't come with the kit.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this kit I was expecting a pump as the picture shows and there was none. I feel like I was taking advantage of and am very disappointed in this kind of sales activity going on in Amazon. I'm not going to send it back because maybe I can find a pump to replace it but it should've been included in the price if it was in the picture and now I'm going to have to go buy a pump. So I'm very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C Gomas

product_meta.title: Delta Education Bottle Rokit Science Kit
product_meta.description:
The Delta Education 110-1209 Bottle Rokit Science Kit is an educational supply kit for students to explore principles of rocket propulsion that turns an ordinary soda pop bottle into a rocket, is made from durable, vacuum-formed polystyrene, and includes a soda pop bottle, screw cap, O-ring, rubber nozzle, three fins, pressure tube, and support wire. The screw cap attaches to the bottle with the O-ring to create an airtight seal. The fins attach to the screw cap to hold the bottle in place for launching and measure 4 x 2.5 inches (H x W). (H is height, the vertical distance from the lowest to highest point; W is width, the horizontal distance from left to right.) A support wire helps hold the bottle upright for launch. The 5’ long tubing has nozzles at each end and connects the soda bottle with a pump (sold separately) or a standard bicycle tire pump. 

Science education products incorporate applied math and science principles into classroom projects. Teachers in pre-K, elementary, and secondary classrooms use science education kits and products alongside science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) curriculum to demonstrate STEM concepts and real-world applications through hands-on activities. Science education projects include a broad range of activities, such as practical experiments in engineering, aeronautics, robotics, energy, chemistry, physics, biology, and geology.

School Specialty provides instructional materials and supplies under dozens of brands, among them Think Math, Delta Education, Frey Scientific, Childcraft, and School Smart. The company, founded in 1959, is headquartered in Greenville, WI. 

What’s in the Box? 

 * Soda pop bottle
 * Screw cap
 * O-ring
 * Rubber nozzle
 * Fins (3)
 * Pressure tube (5’ length)
 * Support wire
 * Instructions
feature_bullets: Educational supply kit for students to explore principles of rocket propulsion
Turns an ordinary soda pop bottle into a rocket
Includes soda pop bottle, screw cap, O-ring, rubber nozzle, three fins, pressure tubing, and support wire

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
